    constant addChangedTypeToTransaction
    utils/Transaction.js, line 154

    If type.parent was added in current transaction, type technically did not change, it was just added and we should not fire events for type.

    constant callTypeObservers
    types/AbstractType.js, line 237

    Call event listeners with an event. This will also add an event to all parents (for .observeDeep handlers).

    constant findMarker
    types/AbstractType.js, line 97

    Search marker help us to find positions in the associative array faster.

    They speed up the process of finding a position without much bookkeeping.

    A maximum of maxSearchMarker objects are created.

    This function always returns a refreshed marker (updated timestamp)

    constant getTypeChildren

    Accumulate all (list) children of a type and return them as an Array.

    globalSearchMarkerTimestamp :number
    types/AbstractType.js, line 31

    A unique timestamp that identifies each marker.

    Time is relative,.. this is more like an ever-increasing clock.

    constant keepItem
    structs/Item.js, line 67

    Make sure that neither item nor any of its parents is ever deleted.

    This property does not persist when storing it into a database or when sending it to other peers

    constant logType
    utils/logging.js, line 13

    Convenient helper to log type information.

    Do not use in productive systems as the output can be immense!

    Type Definitions

    UndoManagerOptions
    utils/UndoManager.js, line 136

    Properties:
    Name Type Attributes Default Description
    UndoManagerOptions.captureTimeout number <optional>
    		 500
    UndoManagerOptions.deleteFilter function <optional>
    		 ()=>true

    Sometimes it is necessary to filter whan an Undo/Redo operation can delete. If this filter returns false, the type/item won't be deleted even it is in the undo/redo scope.
    UndoManagerOptions.trackedOrigins Set.<any> <optional>
    		 new Set([null])
